stlearn.pl.het_plot¶

stlearn.pl.het_plot(adata: anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, het: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, use_cluster: str = 'louvain', dpi: int = 100, spot_size: Union[float, int] = 6.5, name: str = None, output: str = None)[source]¶

Plot tissue clusters and cluster heterogeneity using heatmap :param adata: :type adata: AnnData The data object to plot :param het: :type het: pd.DataFrame Cluster heterogeneity count results from tl.cci.het :param use_cluster: :type use_cluster: str The clustering results to use :param dpi: :type dpi: bool Dots per inch :param spot_size: :type spot_size: Union[float,int] Spot size

Returns

Return type

N/A
